body.head:
<meta name="keywords" content="${keywords}"> <meta name="description" content="${project.description}"> <meta name="author" content="Viktor Tovstyi"> <meta property="og:title" content="${project.name}" /> <meta property="og:description" content="${project.description}" /> <meta property="og:url" content="${project.url}" /> <meta property="og:type" content="website" /> <meta property="og:image" content="/images/logo-big.png" /> <meta property="og:image:type" content="image/png" /> <meta property="og:image:width" content="280" /> <meta property="og:image:height" content="280" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://macha.machanism.org/css/site.css" /> <script type="text/javascript" src="https://machanism.org/js/custom.js"></script>
